hotels.hotelDescription: The Stratosphere Tower observation deck features 360-degree views of Las Vegas to the Strip. The gateway between vintage Vegas and Strip glitz, the hotel is close to shopping, the monorail and the Convention Center. The Strip (Las Vegas)

Set in the center of the Strip, this unique resort provides an enchanting destination amid the attractions of Las Vegas. The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas is less than 5 miles from McCarran International Airport. The Strip (Las Vegas)

This Paris-themed hotel is 3 miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center and less than 5 miles from downtown. Guests enter through the Arc de Triomphe, star-gaze from atop the Eiffel Tower, and stroll past the Louvre. The Strip (Las Vegas)

This Art Deco-style hotel is located on the Strip behind the Grand Bazaar Shops, a 2-acre shopping plaza with over 120 specialty stores and dining venues and is accessible via a moving sidewalk at the Heart of the Las Vegas Strip. The Strip (Las Vegas)
Overlooking the Las Vegas skyline, this 64-story luxury resort stands adjacent to the Fashion Show Mall. It is a short cab ride to the Las Vegas Convention Center. West of The Strip

One of 7 stops on the Monorail line, this famed, 2,579-room hotel is in the midst of Strip activity. It is 1 mile from Fashion Show Mall and less than 3 miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center.  The Strip (Las Vegas)
hotels.hotelName: Harrah's Hotel and Casino Las Vegas
hotels.localizedHotelName: Harrah's Hotel and Casino Las Vegas
hotels.nonLocalizedName: Harrah's Hotel and Casino Las Vegas

hotels.hotelDescription:
At the heart of the Las Vegas Strip, ARIA Resort & Casino offers a luxurious resort experience with technologically advanced accommodations, world-class dining and entertainment, upscale shopping and more. 
 The Strip (Las Vegas)

Located in Paradise, this luxury condominium resort is within 2 mi (3 km) of Crystals at City Center, University of Nevada-Las Vegas, and Thomas and Mack Center. Las Vegas Convention Center and Fashion Show Mall are also within 3 mi (5 km).  East of The Strip
hotels.hotelName: Luxury Suites International At The Signature
hotels.localizedHotelName: Luxury Suites International At The Signature
hotels.nonLocalizedName: Luxury Suites International At The Signature

hotels.hotelDescription: A tribute to the opulence of Rome, this Las Vegas Strip resort is buffered from crowds by a vast open-air plaza; both the Las Vegas Convention Center and downtown are within 3 miles.  The Strip (Las Vegas)

This all-suite Las Vegas resort and spa offers complimentary shuttle service to casinos and local shopping areas. The hotel boasts an onsite Lazy River.
 South of The Strip

Every room is a suite at the Rio! The Rio hosts more than 2,500 suites, providing spectacular views of Las Vegas. Complimentary shuttles whisk guests to the Strip, a mile away; Fashion Show Mall and the convention center are within 4 miles.
 West of The Strip

Located at the southern end of the Las Vegas Strip and close to McCarran Airport, this castle-shaped hotel features royal accommodations and a traditional action-packed medieval dinner show.
 The Strip (Las Vegas)

The Hard Rock, which contains a 5-acre water playground popular with the young and the hip, is within 2 miles of the Las Vegas Strip, Las Vegas Convention Center, and McCarran International Airport. East of The Strip

With 2 22-story towers and an eye-catching 30-story pyramid topped by a powerful light beam, this resort is 2 miles from McCarran International Airport in Las Vegas.
 The Strip (Las Vegas)

Occupying a premium spot on the iconic Las Vegas Strip, this modern resort is a short stroll from the LINQ outdoor shopping promenade and the High Roller, the worldâ€™s tallest observation wheel.   The Strip (Las Vegas)

We are connected to Crystals and a step from the casinos, but in our hotel youâ€™ll find an oasis of serenity. Our rooms are a model of contemporary design with subtle oriental touches and breathtaking views. The Strip (Las Vegas)
Opened in late 2005, this 25-story hotel and casino is just east of I-15, on the South Strip, 5 miles from the airport, and 9 miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center. South of The Strip
hotels.hotelName: South Point Hotel, Casino, and Spa
hotels.localizedHotelName: South Point Hotel, Casino, and Spa
hotels.nonLocalizedName: South Point Hotel, Casino, and Spa

hotels.hotelDescription: Connected to the Palms Las Vegas via an enclosed, motorized walkway, this 49-story hotel is 2 miles from the Sands Expo Convention and less than 3 miles from the Bali Hai Golf Club. West of The Strip
hotels.hotelName: Palms Place Hotel and Spa at the Palms Las Vegas
hotels.localizedHotelName: Palms Place Hotel and Spa at the Palms Las Vegas
hotels.nonLocalizedName: Palms Place Hotel and Spa at the Palms Las Vegas

hotels.hotelDescription: Located in Paradise, this luxury hotel is within 2 mi (3 km) of Crystals at City Center, University of Nevada-Las Vegas, and Thomas and Mack Center. Las Vegas Convention Center and Fashion Show Mall are also within 3 mi (5 km).  East of The Strip
hotels.hotelName: Jet Luxury Resorts @ The Signature Condo Hotel
hotels.localizedHotelName: Jet Luxury Resorts @ The Signature Condo Hotel
hotels.nonLocalizedName: Jet Luxury Resorts @ The Signature Condo Hotel

hotels.hotelDescription: Located in The Strip, this spa hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Little White Wedding Chapel, Las Vegas Convention Center, and Fashion Show Mall. Las Vegas Premium Outlets is 1.8 mi (2.9 km) away.  The Strip (Las Vegas)
hotels.hotelName: SLS Las Vegas a Tribute Portfolio Resort
hotels.localizedHotelName: SLS Las Vegas a Tribute Portfolio Resort
hotels.nonLocalizedName: SLS Las Vegas a Tribute Portfolio Resort

hotels.hotelDescription: A storied name in Las Vegas, the downtown Golden Nugget Hotel and Casino is 2 miles north of the Strip; the Fremont Street Experience dazzles right outside, nightly. Downtown Las Vegas

This non-gaming and non-smoking all-suite Vegas resort presents a relaxing atmosphere with views of the Strip and mountains; the Strip is 1.5 blocks away; the Las Vegas Convention Center is less than 2 miles.
 East of The Strip

Adjacent to the Las Vegas Convention Center, this resort is a 10-minute drive from McCarran International Airport. The on-site stop for the Las Vegas Monorail offers convenient access to the Strip.

East of The Strip
Comprising 40- and 55-story towers, Palms Casino Resort is 1 mile west of the Las Vegas Strip, 3 miles from the Forum Shops, and 5 miles from the convention center. West of The Strip
This all-suite resort and casino on the Las Vegas Strip is a short drive from Fashion Show Mall, the convention center,  Downtown, and McCarran Airport. The Strip (Las Vegas)

travelAdsList.hotelDescription: Located in the heart of Daly City, this hotel is 0.5 mi (0.7 km) from Cow Palace and 3 mi (4.8 km) from City College of San Francisco. San Francisco State University and AT&T Park are also within 6 mi (10 km).  San Francisco International Airport (SFO)

Situated near the airport, this hotel is within 12 mi (20 km) of Cow Palace, San Francisco State University, and San Francisco Zoo. See's Candies is 1 mi (1.7 km) away.  San Francisco International Airport (SFO)
travelAdsList.hotelName: Courtyard by Marriott San Francisco Airport
travelAdsList.localizedHotelName: Courtyard by Marriott San Francisco Airport
